note.p: Burial: Church of St Giles-in-the-Fields, near London
Education: Westminster School; Trinity College, Cambridge; BA (1654); Queens' College, Cambridge; MA (1657), MD (1664)
Career: Fellow of Queens' (1655-1660); practised in Shrewsbury, Shropshire (1659), Oxford and afterwards in London; Physician to the Charterhouse, London (1672)
Sources: Bulloch's Roll; DNB; Venn; Hunter; Munk's Roll
Notes: Possible death dates of 5 or 16 April 1691 (earlier date from DNB and OW).
